languages.text: {n}Абеляр сохраняет подобающее ситуации сдержанное выражение — пока взгляд его не падает на лицо покойного. Он хмурится. Присматривается с подозрением. Затем изумленно, едва ли не растерянно выдыхает:{/n} "Да провалиться мне на этом месте! Вот это... встреча, или не знаю как лучше выразиться, учитывая обстоятельства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр сохраняет подобающее ситуации сдержанное выражение — пока взгляд его не падает на лицо покойного. Он хмурится. Присматривается с подозрением. Затем изумленно, едва ли не растерянно выдыхает:{/n} "Да провалиться мне на этом месте! Вот это... встреча, или не знаю как лучше выразиться, учитывая обстоятельства".

languages.text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр сохраняет подобающее ситуации сдержанное выражение — пока взгляд его не падает на лицо покойного. Он хмурится. Присматривается с подозрением. Затем изумленно, едва ли не растерянно выдыхает:{/n} "Да провалиться мне на этом месте! Вот это... встреча, или не знаю как лучше выразиться, учитывая обстоятельства".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard maintains a reserved expression fitting for the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers into it suspiciously. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is... quite the meeting, or I don't know what this is, considering the circumstances."

{n}Abelard maintains a reserved expression fitting for the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers into it suspiciously. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is... quite the meeting, or I don't know what this is, considering the circumstances."

{n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

{n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

{n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德始终保持着适宜的庄重表情，但他看到死者的脸时，他皱起了眉头，带着怀疑的目光打量着死者。随后，他喘了口粗气，惊讶得几乎愣在了原地。{/n}“我的天！没想到会在这种地方和你见面……如果这真的可以算得上是‘见面’的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德始终保持着适宜的庄重表情，但他看到死者的脸时，他皱起了眉头，带着怀疑的目光打量着死者。随后，他喘了口粗气，惊讶得几乎愣在了原地。{/n}“我的天！没想到会在这种地方和你见面……如果这真的可以算得上是‘见面’的话。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard mantiene una expresión sombría acorde con la ocasión... hasta que ve la cara del fallecido. Frunce el ceño y la estudia con suspicacia. Después, emite un grito ahogado, atónito, prácticamente aturdido.{/n} «¡Que me aspen! Este es un encuentro extraordinario... aunque no sé si debería llamarlo así, dadas las circunstancias».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard mantiene una expresión sombría acorde con la ocasión... hasta que ve la cara del fallecido. Frunce el ceño y la estudia con suspicacia. Después, emite un grito ahogado, atónito, prácticamente aturdido.{/n} «¡Que me aspen! Este es un encuentro extraordinario... aunque no sé si debería llamarlo así, dadas las circunstancias».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはこの場にふさわしい重々しい表情をしているが、亡骸を見た瞬間に顔をしかめた。疑り深く、棺桶の中を覗き、息を呑み、驚き、呆然とした。{/n}「なんと！まさかこんな形で会うとは…このような状態で『会う』というのもおかしな話かもしれませんが」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはこの場にふさわしい重々しい表情をしているが、亡骸を見た瞬間に顔をしかめた。疑り深く、棺桶の中を覗き、息を呑み、驚き、呆然とした。{/n}「なんと！まさかこんな形で会うとは…このような状態で『会う』というのもおかしな話かもしれませんが」

languages.text: {n}Abelards Miene ist dem Anlass angemessen ernst – bis er das Gesicht des Verstorbenen erblickt. Er runzelt die Stirn. Er betrachtet es misstrauisch. Dann schnappt er erstaunt, fast benommen nach Luft.{/n} "Das ist doch ...! Was für ein Zusammentreffen ... falls man das unter diesen Umständen so nennen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Miene ist dem Anlass angemessen ernst – bis er das Gesicht des Verstorbenen erblickt. Er runzelt die Stirn. Er betrachtet es misstrauisch. Dann schnappt er erstaunt, fast benommen nach Luft.{/n} "Das ist doch ...! Was für ein Zusammentreffen ... falls man das unter diesen Umständen so nennen kann."

languages.text: {n}Abélard, qui affichait jusqu'ici une expression grave de circonstance, se décompose en voyant le visage du défunt. Il commence par froncer les sourcils, puis plisse les yeux d'un air suspicieux avant de laisser échapper un cri de surprise, presque abasourdi.{/n} « Ma parole ! Je ne m'attendais pas à faire une telle rencontre ici... Enfin, façon de parler. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard, qui affichait jusqu'ici une expression grave de circonstance, se décompose en voyant le visage du défunt. Il commence par froncer les sourcils, puis plisse les yeux d'un air suspicieux avant de laisser échapper un cri de surprise, presque abasourdi.{/n} « Ma parole ! Je ne m'attendais pas à faire une telle rencontre ici... Enfin, façon de parler. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, duruma yaraşır ciddiyette bir yüz ifadesi takınmış. Ta ki mermuhun suratını görene dek. O an gözleri kısılıp şüpheyle bakmaya başlıyor. Bir anda nefesi kesiliyor, âdeta hayretle serseme dönüyor.{/n} "Yok artık! Kavuşmanın böylesi! Tabii bu duruma ne kadar kavuşma denilebilirse."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard maintains a grave expression befitting the occasion — until he sees the face of the deceased. He frowns. He peers at it with suspicion. Then he gasps, astonished, almost dazed.{/n} "I'll be! This is quite the meeting... if it can be called such, under the circumstances."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, duruma yaraşır bir şekilde vakur bir ifadeye bürünüyor. Fakat merhumun yüzünü gördüğünde kaşlarını çatıyor. Bedene şüpheli gözlerle bakıyor. Daha sonra şok oluyor, deyim yerindeyse serseme dönüyor.{/n} "Bir yaşıma daha girdim! Kavuşmanın böylesi! Tabii bu duruma ne kadar kavuşma denilebilirse..."
